p: Reference to the planned comparisons of % change from baseline data showed that, in comparison to placebo, accuracy on the RVIP task was significantly enhanced following the higher dose (100 Î¼L) of essential oil during the 1 h (T (252) = 2.88, p < 0.01) and 3 h (T (252) = 2.04, p < 0.05) post-dose assessments. (Multivariate main effect of treatment (F (2, 20) = 3.84, p < 0.05)).
